meanings.sent1: She remained undismayed despite facing many challenges.
meanings.sent2: The hiker was undismayed by the steep mountain ahead.
meanings.sent3: The cat, undismayed by the cucumber prank, continued to play.
meanings.sent4: Like a sturdy oak tree, he stood undismayed in the face of the storm.
meanings.sent5: Her undismayed attitude inspired others to keep going.

meanings.sent1: The fearless firefighter entered the burning building undismayed.
meanings.sent2: The undismayed child bravely approached the unfamiliar dog.
meanings.sent3: The undismayed squirrel fearlessly stole nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: With undismayed confidence, she tackled the challenging presentation.
meanings.sent5: His undismayed demeanor calmed those around him.
